Oral suspension
Cautionary and advisory labels

Label 19 - Warning: This medicine makes you sleepy. If you still feel sleepy the next day, do not drive or use tools or machines. Do not drink alcohol

Nitrazepam 2.5mg/5ml oral suspension <ph outputclass="manufacturer">(Alliance Healthcare (Distribution) Ltd)</ph> 28040211000001108

Schedule 4 (CD Benz)

Nitrazepam 500 microgram per 1 ml

  • 150 ml POM

    NHS indicative price = £10.60

    Drug Tariff (Part VIIIA Category C) price = £10.60

NITRAZEPAM
